import { useState, useRef, forwardRef, useImperativeHandle, useEffect } from "react" import { NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min" import { AnimatePresence, motion } from "framer-motion"; const Menu = forwardRef((props, ref) => { const [Open, setOpen] = useState(false); const active = { color: "orange" } useImperativeHandle(ref, () => { return { toggle: () => setOpen(!Open), } }) return ( {Open && (

)} ) }) export default Menu
